name: The Mill - Nine Men's Morris
description:
Welcome to the best Nine Men’s Morris game on the App Store!

Make Mills by aligning 3 pieces, every Mill you make allows you to remove one of your opponent's pieces.

The classic Nine Men’s Morris is a strategy board game, commonly found on the back of a Checkers / Draughts board, that is as easy to get as Tic Tac Toe, but as hard to master as Chess. Excellent for testing your skills or teaching strategy to kids.

Challenge friends on the same device, find an opponent online, or try to beat one of our well-trained virtual players in the single player mode, with 3 difficulties to play.

A true classic! DOWNLOAD IT NOW, FREE and start climbing the High-Score!

Key features:
- Classic design
- Choose between 3 modes of difficulty
- Multiplayer challenge against real humans, online!
- Play with your friends on the same device (2 players Multiplayer)
- Climb the Global High Score
- Game Center achievements
- Kids will love it!
